name: Furnax
description: Pip's companion - Black with dark blue stripes, cold aura. Unruly but well-trained, intelligent, rescued by the academy.
personality: Intelligent, unruly but well-trained. Loyal to Pip.
backstory: Rescued by Culdor Academy. Became Pip's companion.
appearance: Black fur with dark blue stripes. Emits a cold aura.

notable_actions.description: Directs the group on how to proceed with a task, showing leadership.
Performs a perception check to ensure the group remains undetected.
Attempts an intimidation roleplay, but the target does not react as expected.
Checks if the party members ate popcorn, implying they might be guilty.
Participated in a boss fight where he and another party member were betrayed.
Was a bodyguard for a wizard during the one-shot, which ended tragically.
Failed to hit the character with a bite attack twice.
Failed to hit the character with a stinger attack, rolling a 13.
Attempts to cast Witchbolt, showing his combat skills and willingness to engage in battle.
Discussed a creative approach to entering the area.
Successfully cast a spell to weaken an enemy.
Mends the ship with Furnax and Mend spell.

inventory.name: Possibly a skill or spell that can be used again, but not immediately.
inventory.description: Furnax mentioned he could use his ability to weaken the hellhound multiple times per day, but it was currently unavailable due to a lack of mana or spell site.

memorable_quotes.quote: Je ziet zo'n pakkie wens en jij zegt, ah, kijk die oude tand.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax makes an amusing observation about perceiving a bear costume as a teenager in a bear suit during the dice rolling session.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dus, alles is er weer op de gaten. / Maar dat gaat eigenlijk dus... / Dat zal dus wat komen... / Ik ben een kat. / Je bent geen kat. / Jij had dus eigenlijk om acht uur nou de wacht.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax questions why he is acting like a cat towards someone else and mentions his duty to take watch at eight o'clock.

memorable_quotes.quote: Terwijl ze heel kalm overkomt, blijft niet veel haast aan de hand te zijn, ik word je wel ontploffed als je maar geluid te krijgen is.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax warns a potential threat with a sarcastic and threatening tone, highlighting his protectiveness.

memorable_quotes.quote: en niet dezelfde beweging, zie je toch... soms een beetje al niet ontsnappend bewegen, maar wel van dat ze ongemakkelijk zijn. Weet je, als ze een beetje heel foutjes ziet.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is examining a restrained creature to ensure its well-being.

memorable_quotes.quote: Wat zeg je? Natuurlijk. Als je niet oppast, dan gooi ik je dadelijk dit water in je gezicht.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax warns another character about the consequences of not paying attention during an intimidation attempt.
Furnax expresses satisfaction with a straightforward Perception check.
Furnax directly states his dissatisfaction about having to pay for the service, indicating a conflict within the party.

memorable_quotes.quote:
Ik ben best wel zo slim.
Als je op een boot staat en je begint met vliegen.
Die boot gaat een stuk sneller.
Nee, dat had ik niet gedacht.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax boasts about his intelligence and flying abilities, showing his confidence in himself.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dat was poepcorn. Poepcorn in de onderbroek.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax tries to lighten the mood by making a crude joke, but it backfires and draws attention to itself.

memorable_quotes.quote: Er is geen inhoudelijke informatie. Er wordt ook niet over geschreven wie ze zoekt. Of dergelijke. Het is heel standaard van.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax questions whether the diary contains any substantive information, hinting that the content may be misleading or dangerous.
Furnax agrees with Pipira's point, adding a playful element to the discussion.

memorable_quotes.quote: als er een net 20 was geweest had hij waarschijnlijk in 1 keer door het midden
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax mentioned that if he had rolled a 20, the attack would have been fatal.

memorable_quotes.quote: Omdat ik dan al weet welke monsters ik ook wil gebruiken
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains why they are prepared with specific monsters in mind, showing foresight.

memorable_quotes.quote: The bag of distraction appears as a finely crafted satchel Made of dark leather Covered in arcane symbols of mischief and trickery And small mechanical toys that whirl with their own magical essence.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax gives a detailed description of the bag of distraction, highlighting its magical and mechanical features.

memorable_quotes.quote: Je hebt een spel? / Ja. / Wat je hebt gemerkt, is deze heeft geen zwak of sterk in. / In deze lijkt het wel neutraal.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is explaining that the entity they are facing does not have a clear strength or weakness, leading to a discussion about their game choice.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dan gaan we. / Dan haal ik die even weg en dan wil ik Witchbolt casten.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is emphasizing the importance of casting Witchbolt despite the current situation.

memorable_quotes.quote: Explains the consequences of missing a concentration save, emphasizing the importance of staying focused.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains that missing a concentration save results in losing one's blurriness effect, stressing the critical nature of maintaining focus during combat.

memorable_quotes.quote: Explains the nature of concentration saves and their impact on spell effects.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains that missing a concentration save results in losing one's blurriness effect, emphasizing the importance of maintaining focus during combat.

memorable_quotes.quote: Je zou er nog nog eens daaronder. Maar dan zou je wel een rol moeten doen. Want dat is ook een behoorlijke val.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains the potential dangers and precautions needed when jumping from a hole in the zeppelin's structure.

current_goals: Mentions the recent acquisition of spells related to a flying vessel, hinting at progress in his quest.
